name: Vanishing
description:
VERY QUICK AND VERY BETA - Maybe sometime w  

  It was supposed to be finished for Halloween but I started it on the 30th which is ridiculous for a giant project but I wanted to upload anyway  

Basically I was aiming for a RPG + Visual Novel mix in which the MC has to manage his health and eventually stops seeing things due to supernatural phenomena - none of it is text yet as it is very beta but I think you can see how the house is haunted etc ;  so for these reasons I decided to send it anyway  

 I am dropping this after some thought because I am having issues at personal life rn and I do not want to finish it anymore and am going to prioritize early projects but am going to use a similar engine in others so please wait patiently!
